verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> against the prophets <WH5030> of Israel <WH3478> who prophesy, <WH5012> and say <WH559> to those who prophesy <WH5030> out of their own heart, <WH3820> Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh: <WH3068>
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> Woe <WH1945> to the foolish <WH5036> prophets, <WH5030> who follow <WH1980> their own spirit, <WH7307> and have seen nothing! <WH7200>
Israel, <WH3478> your prophets <WH5030> have been like foxes <WH7776> in the waste places. <WH2723>

You have not gone up <WH5927> into the gaps, <WH6556> neither built up <WH1443> the wall <WH1447> for the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> to stand <WH5975> in the battle <WH4421> in the day <WH3117> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

They have seen <WH2372> falsehood <WH7723> and lying <WH3577> divination, <WH7081> who say, <WH5002> Yahweh <WH3068> says; <WH559> but Yahweh <WH3068> has not sent <WH7971> them: <WH3176> and they have made men to hope that the word <WH1697> would be confirmed. <WH6965>

Haven't <WH2372> you seen a false <WH7723> vision, <WH4236> and haven't <WH1696> you spoken a lying <WH7723> divination, <WH4738> in that you say, <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> says; <WH5002> but I have not spoken? <WH559>

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Because you have spoken <WH1696> falsehood, <WH7723> and seen <WH2372> lies, <WH3577> therefore, <WH5002> behold, I am against you, says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

My hand <WH3027> shall be against the prophets <WH5030> who see <WH2374> false <WH7723> visions, <WH7080> and who divine lies: <WH3577> they shall not be in the council <WH5475> of my people, <WH5971> neither shall they be written <WH3789> in the writing <WH3791> of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> neither shall they enter <WH935> into the land <WH127> of Israel; <WH3478> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

Because, <WH2937> even because they have seduced my people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> Peace; <WH7965> and there is no peace; <WH7965> and when one builds up <WH1129> a wall, <WH2434> behold, <WH2009> they plaster <WH2902> it with whitewash: <WH8602>

tell <WH559> those who plaster <WH2902> it with whitewash, <WH8602> that it shall fall: <WH5307> there shall be an overflowing <WH7857> shower; <WH1653> and you, <WH859> great hailstones, <WH417> shall fall; <WH5307> and a stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307> shall tear it. <WH1234>
Behold, <WH7023> when the wall has fallen, <WH5307> shall it not be said <WH559> to you, <WH2915> Where is the plaster with which you have plastered it? <WH2902>

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> I will even tear <WH1234> it with a stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307> in my wrath; <WH2534> and there shall be an overflowing <WH7857> shower <WH1653> in my anger, <WH639> and great hailstones <WH417> in wrath <WH2534> to consume it. <WH3617>

So will I break down <WH2040> the wall <WH7023> that you have plastered <WH2902> with whitewash, <WH8602> and bring <WH5060> it down to the ground, <WH776> so that its foundation <WH3247> shall be uncovered; <WH1540> and it shall fall, <WH5307> and you shall be consumed <WH3615> in its midst: <WH8432> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

Thus will I accomplish <WH3615> my wrath <WH2534> on the wall, <WH7023> and on those who have plastered <WH2902> it with whitewash; <WH8602> and I will tell <WH559> you, <WH7023> The wall is no more, <WH2902> neither those who plastered it;

to wit, <WH5030> the prophets of Israel <WH3478> who prophesy <WH5012> concerning Jerusalem, <WH3389> and who see <WH2374> visions <WH2377> of peace <WH7965> for her, <WH7965> and there is no peace, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

You, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against the daughters <WH1323> of your people, <WH5971> who prophesy <WH5012> out of their own heart; <WH3820> and prophesy against them, <WH5012>

and say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Woe <WH1945> to the women who sew <WH8609> pillows <WH3704> on all elbows, <WH679> and make <WH6213> kerchiefs <WH4555> for the head <WH7218> of persons of every stature <WH6967> to hunt <WH6679> souls! <WH5315> Will you hunt <WH6679> the souls <WH5315> of my people, <WH5971> and save <WH2421> souls <WH5315> alive for yourselves? <WH2421>

You have profaned <WH2490> me among my people <WH5971> for handfuls <WH8168> of barley <WH8184> and for pieces <WH6595> of bread, <WH3899> to kill <WH4191> the souls <WH5315> who should not die, <WH4191> and to save <WH2421> the souls <WH5315> alive <WH2421> who should not live, <WH2421> by your lying <WH3576> to my people <WH5971> who listen <WH8085> to lies. <WH3577>

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Behold, <WH3704> I am against your pillows, with which you <WH859> there hunt <WH6679> the souls <WH5315> to make them fly, <WH6524> and I will tear <WH7167> them from your arms; <WH2220> and I will let the souls <WH5315> go, <WH7971> even the souls <WH5315> whom you hunt <WH6679> to make them fly. <WH6524>

Your kerchiefs <WH4555> also will I tear, <WH7167> and deliver <WH5337> my people <WH5971> out of your hand, <WH3027> and they shall be no more in your hand <WH3027> to be hunted; <WH4686> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

Because with lies <WH8267> you have grieved <WH3512> the heart <WH3820> of the righteous, <WH6662> whom I have not made sad; <WH3512> and strengthened <WH2388> the hands <WH3027> of the wicked, <WH7451> that he should not return <WH7725> from his wicked <WH7563> way, <WH1870> and be saved alive: <WH2421>

Therefore you shall no more see <WH2372> false <WH7723> visions, <WH7080> nor practice divination. <WH7081> I will deliver <WH5337> my people <WH5971> out of your hand; <WH3027> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
